sentences.en: Activists at WWF, another pressure group, say a much tougher regime is needed.
sentences.cn: 另一方面也有来自世界野生动物基金的压力, 该组织的积极分子认为应当采取更加严厉的(保)策.

sentences.en: Adopting of Welded Fabric ( WWF ) has several advantages such as improving construction quality and saving construction time.
sentences.cn: 采用焊接钢筋网能提高工程质量,缩短工期.

sentences.en: All entrance fee will be donated to WWF Hong Kong for conservation and environmental education programmes.
sentences.cn: 所有报名费将捐赠予世界自然基金会香港分会,以推行保育及环保教育项目.

sentences.en: I sometimes donate money to WWF because I love animals.
sentences.cn: 因为我喜爱动物,有时候我把钱捐献给世界自然基金会.

sentences.en: Lastly , four effective and feasible ways are planed to improve WWF model.
sentences.cn: 4、提出四种有效可行的模型改进方案.

sentences.en: October - The Mai Po Wildlife Education Centre opened by WWF International President HRH Duke of Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 米埔野生生物教育中心开幕,由世界自然基金会国际会长爱丁堡公爵主持开幕仪式.

sentences.en: The WWF is trying to the panda.
sentences.cn: 世界自然基金会正尽力熊猫.

sentences.en: The WWF says it is worried about the loss of and damage to Earth's environment.
sentences.cn: 世界自然基金会称很担心这给地球环境带来的损失和破坏。

sentences.en: We are an independent part of the global WWF network whose headquarters are based in Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 世界天然基金会喷鼻港分会属世界天然基金会国际网络的一分子.

sentences.en: WWF is one of Hong Kong's leading environmental charitable organisations.
sentences.cn: 世界自然基金会香港分会是本港主要的慈善环保组织.

sentences.en: WWF staff investigating pollution in the Tung Chung River on Lantau.
sentences.cn: 本会职员调查大屿山东涌河的污染情况.

sentences.en: You Can't Afford to be Slow in Emergency – Act Now for the Planet ( WWF ) .
sentences.cn: 紧急事故中不能承受行动缓慢之痛,为了我们的星球, 立马 行动,保护地球.

trans.tran_cn: World Wrestling Federation，世界摔跤联合会，World Wildlife Fund 世界野生动物基金
World Wildlife Fund 世界自然基金会
世界自然基金会(World Wide Fund For Nature)
